title-group.article-title: The World in Pieces: Concepts of Anxiety in H. C. Andersen's "The Snow Queen"

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2008 The Johns Hopkins University Press

ref.mixed-citation: http://www.kb.dk/elib/noder/hcamusik/snedronningen/indexen.htm for full description and original text

Søren Kierkegaard, The Concept of Irony, with Continual Reference to Socrates, trans. Howard V. Hong and Edna H. Hong (Princeton: Princeton UP, 1989) 254.
Kierkegaard, The Concept of Anxiety, trans. Reidar Thomte, (Princeton: Princeton UP, 1980) 124.

Translator's Introduction, The Sickness Unto Death 12
